## import data 
```{r import_data}
read_as_df <- function(path, col_name) {
  df <- read.csv(path, header = FALSE) %>% data.frame()
  names(df) <- col_name
  return(df)
}

points <- read.csv("path.csv")
points_pick <- read.csv("path_pick.csv")

head(points)
```

## plot using plotly package
```{r plotly}
points %>% 
  plot_ly() %>%
  add_paths(x = ~x, y = ~y, z = ~z)

points_pick %>% 
  plot_ly() %>%
  add_paths(x = ~x, y = ~y, z = ~z)
```
